Key Match Events: Mike Yastrzemski hit a two-run homer in the 7th inning to put the San Francisco Giants ahead for good
Willy Adames and Jackson Chourio hit towering two-run homers
Thairo Estrada nearly homered but was caught by Blake Perkins
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thairo Estrada's drive was caught by Blake Perkins, marking his 4th homer-preventing catch this season
Chourio's homer was the longest by any Brewer this season at 449 feet
Others: The Giants played their fourth straight one-run game, going 2-2 during that stretch
Logan Webb hadn't allowed a homer in his last 43 1/3 innings before Tuesday's game
